attributes.action: Stop giving immigrants more than the average british citizen!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I sat at home yesterday as 9 immigrants moved into a house opposite mine (free of charge), and I found it hard to justify why they need a mercedes, 32 inch plasma screen american styled fridge (double door) Top of the line mobile phones (with credit)and anything else they felt they needed. They told me them selves that they hadn't payed for any of it, it was all supplied by the goverment! we need to lower the amount of money spent on immigrants dramatically or risk being flooded by repeating immigrants!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
